title: Drunk On The Wine That Pours From My Wicked Eyes: 13 Feverish Tales
description: DRUNK ON THE WINE THAT POURS FROM MY WICKED EYES: 13 Feverish Tales collects many of Mark McLaughlin’s most bizarre tales, and some of his funniest ones, too. In these stories, you will meet the underground cult of the Abysmal Elite … the King of the Cats, whose secret will amaze you … the unspeakable Prince of Dreadful Magick … spies fighting a zombie conspiracy … a fashion designer with supernatural aspirations … Cleopatra’s unlikely reincarnation … a secretary developing godlike powers … and many more unearthly characters. So pour a glass of your beverage of choice, wine or otherwise, and start reading!Amazon/Kindle link: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B011JR0Y0I/
author: Mark McLaughlin
